title: BBC Local Live: Sheffield and South Yorkshire on Friday 28 October 2016 - BBC News
summary: teenage boy found dead in doncaster shed fire .
police name woman killed in hit-and-run .
new store opens in moor redevelopment .

text: barnsley 2-2 bristol city

text: derby county 2-0 sheffield wednesday

documents.title: goodbye : five things we learned today in south yorkshire
text: we 'll be back with more updates from 08:00 on monday .
have a great weekend , i hope you get the chance to enjoy some of the glorious autumn foliage .
ramon in royston sent this wonderful photo of leaf-lined path to bbc weather watchers .
it makes me impatient to get out and scuff through a pile of dry leaves .
author: Kate Linderholm
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: weather : a dry and mild weekend , cloudy tonight
text: clear spells tonight , which combined with light winds may lead to a few mist patches forming .
cloud will tend to increase from the west after midnight , with outbreaks of light rain over the pennines .
author: Keeley Donovan
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: south yorkshire contingent joins brussels protest on kashmir
text: residents from sheffield , rotherham and doncaster joined hundreds of other protesters from across the uk and europe in brussels to highlight the plight of indian-administered kashmir .
for the past three months the region has seen over 100 people killed , hundreds injured , with many blinded by the use of pellet guns used by india security forces .
india blames pakistan for stirring up violence in the region , a charge that it denies .
both countries claim kashmir in its entirety but only control parts of it .
sheffield city council is also due to discuss the ongoing violence at its november full council meeting next week .

documents.title: doncaster shed fire death : teenage victim named locally
text: the teenage boy whose body was found after a shed fire near doncaster has been named locally as jack sheldon .
south yorkshire fire service say they 're working with the police to establish the circumstances surrounding the death of the 13-year-old .

documents.title: can you identify shoreham street attacker in sheffield ?
text: police want help to identify a man who punched a woman in the face while possibly armed with a knife earlier this month .
the woman suffered serious injuries to her lip and face in the attack at 03:00 on saturday 15 october .
hospital doctors told her the wounds could have been caused by a knife .
the man was with two other men at the time of the reported assault and police would like to speak to them all in relation to the incident .

documents.title: floral tribute left after fatal shed fire in doncaster
text: growing number of tributes to a 13 year old boy who died after a house fire in # doncaster - latest @ twitterid
all reports state shed fire.so which is it ?
its a shed fire in garden of a house
so not a house fire .
no , but if you look at my time line you 'll see its been stated as a shed fire earlier so there is context

documents.title: police name woman killed in hit-and-run in doncaster
text: a 36-year-old woman who died following a collision on barrowfield road , thurnscoe , doncaster on monday has been named as marie cross .
miss cross from the goldthorpe area of barnsley suffered serious injuries and later died in hospital .
a 36-year-old man and a 26-year-old woman were arrested on sus of causing death by dangerous driving and have been bailed .
police would like to speak to anyone who many have seen the collision or who saw the vehicle and its occupants before or after the collision .

documents.title: travel : accident m18 northbound in south yorkshire
text: there 's one lane closed with very slow traffic northbound on the m18 between j1 at bramley and j2 at loversall because of an accident .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: sheffield mp calls for housebuilding to tackle homelessness
text: a plan to improve the way homeless people in england are looked after is being debated in the commons .
at the moment only single parents , those with mental health issues , victims of domestic violence , or military veterans can go to the front of the queue for housing assistance .
it 's proposed that councils are required to help everyone threatened with homelessness .
the labour mp for sheffield south east , clive betts , says building new houses is the real answer to the problem :

documents.title: watch : doncaster fire death latest
text: south yorkshire fire service say they 're trying to establish the circumstances surrounding the death of a 13-year-old boy in doncaster .
he was found dead in a fire in a garden shed at a house in the village of campsall last night .
author: Phil Bodmer
Journalist, BBC Look North

documents.title: mayor of doncaster offers condolences on teenage boy 's death linked to fire
text: @ mayorros : i am deeply saddened to hear of the death of a young boy in campsall last night .
my thoughts and prayers are with his family .

documents.title: mental health failings in sheffield put generation at risk says clegg
text: the liberal democrat mp for sheffield hallam nick clegg says the government needs to ring-fence mental health spending for children to ensure it is spent where it can make a difference .
this week the sheffield children 's nhs foundation trust was told that it must improve child and adolescent mental health services following an inspection by the care quality commission .
mr clegg says there is growing evidence that in some parts of the country money is being diverted elsewhere in the nhs .
mental health , especially in young people , is far too important to ignore .
despite the heroic efforts of nhs mental health workers both in sheffield and all over the country , we are still failing our young people and putting an entire generation at risk ''

documents.title: watch : sheffield school has official 'elephant in the room '
text: a fibreglass elephant designed by a bbc radio sheffield listener has been delivered to its new home , the school where the design was conceived .
it was auctioned off with a herd of others last week at the crucible theatre , for the sheffield children 's hospital .
it went for £ 6,200 and thanks to the generosity of one of the bidders its new home is high storrs school .
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: looking for a smooth criminal ?
text: fighting crime via the medium of interpretive dance ?
well that 's what a group of officers with south yorkshire police are attempting with this dance video to michael jackson 's thriller on the force 's facebook page .
it 's apparently to warn us to stay safe on dark nights .

documents.title: historian explains spate of recent war munitions discoveries in sheffield
text: as some of the older bits of sheffield finally get redeveloped there 's been a bit of a spate of discoveries recently of world war two munitions .
a suspected unexploded bomb was found at the new ikea site yesterday , it turned out to be just a shell .
earlier this month several bombs were found on a building site on matilda street .
and in the summer there was a controlled explosion of a bomb at the former don valley stadium site .
military historian tim lynch says many of the bombs in wwii were designed to bury themselves :

these have delayed fuses , their job is to bury themselves underground so that when the police , the fire brigade and the ambulances come to rescue the wounded these things are ticking away under their feet .
and then hours , even days later they 'll explode .

documents.title: campsall shed fire death : miliband 'very saddened ' by news
text: former labour leader and current mp for doncaster north ed miliband has tweeted :
very saddened by the news from campsall about the death of a young boy .
all my thoughts with his family .
some very hurtful tweets this is important to family especially and to donny folk who know the area .
this event is very tragic to an area which we 've had a lot of tragic events in the last year rip jack
what about vine ?
@ twitterid very saddened by the news from campsall about the death of a young boy .
all my thoughts with his family .
`` > swarm

documents.title: woman killed in hit-and-run named
text: a woman killed in a hit-and-run has been named by south yorkshire police today .
woman killed in hit-and-run named by south yorkshire police
author: Sheffield Star

documents.title: investigation into fire linked to boy 's death not expected to finish today
text: investigation into cause of the tragic fire in campsall , # doncaster is now underway but will not conclude until tomorrow at the earliest

documents.title: weather : cloudy with possible sunny spells this afternoon
text: rather cloudy with some patchy light rain or drizzle becoming dry with some sunny spells possible this afternoon .
winds will be lighter than of late .
author: Owain Wyn Evans
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: demolition work starts on next step for barnsley town centre redevelopment
text: demolition starts today in barnsley in preparation for the next step in the £ 100m town centre redevelopment .
these are the former retail units opposite the may day green market at the corner of kendray street and eldon street .
they are going to make way for a £ 4m community facility which will host the town 's library .
demolition work continues until christmas .

documents.title: listen : investigation under way after dead teenage boy found after shed fire in doncaster
text: south yorkshire police and the fire service have started a joint investigation to try to work out what caused a fire in doncaster after a 13-year-old boy was found dead in a shed .
the fire was at 21:00 last night in a garden shed in byron avenue in campsall .
the body was n't discovered until the fire had been extinguished .
simon dunker from the fire service has been talking to bbc radio sheffield :
author: Kevin Larkin
Doncaster Reporter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: sniffer dogs being used in teenage death investigation after doncaster fire
text: dogs helping in @ twitterid investigation into death of 13 yr old boy in campsall # doncaster arrive at house .
more @ twitterid

documents.title: yorkshire party announces candidate in election for sheffield city region mayor
text: the yorkshire party has announced that mick bower will be its candidate in the election for a sheffield city region mayor next year - even though the party does n't support the idea .

the yorkshire party says the government 's 'city region ' approach towards devolution is `` divisive , undemocratic and limited '' and claims it 's nothing more than an effort to strengthen labour 's grip on south yorkshire .

documents.title: neighbours ' shock after body of 13-year-old boy found in doncaster shed after fire
text: people in campsall in doncaster have told of their shock after the body of a 13-year-old boy was found after a shed fire in byron avenue last night .
a joint investigation by south yorkshire fire service and police is under way to establish the cause of the fire .
neighbours have been talking to bbc radio sheffield :

documents.title: shed death garden taped off by police
text: police have taped off the garden of the house in campsall # doncaster where a 13 year old boy died in a shed fire .
more @ twitterid
author: Kevin Larkin
Doncaster Reporter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: watch : big new primark opens as part of moor redevelopment in sheffield
text: the next phase of the redevelopment of the moor in sheffield takes a step forward today with a new primark store opening its doors .
this is phase two of the retail and leisure development of the area which will also see a new leisure hub providing a nine-screen cinema and seven restaurants .

documents.title: watch : new primark store brings 175 jobs to sheffield
text: a vast new primark store opened this morning marking the latest phase of the redevelopment of shopping and leisure on the moor in sheffield .
it 's created 175 new jobs .
still on the way is a new leisure hub providing a 9 screen cinema and 7 restaurants :
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: police investigating how teenage boy came to be found dead in doncaster shed
text: south yorkshire police have confirmed that the victim of a shed fire in doncaster is believed to be a 13-year-old boy .
emergency services were called to an byron avenue , campsall , at around 9pm last night .
a police spokesman said : `` a body was discovered after the fire was extinguished and while formal identification is yet to take place , it is believed to be that of a 13-year-old boy .
`` a joint investigation between south yorkshire police and south yorkshire fire and rescue service is continuing this morning . ''

documents.title: weather : starting cloudy but brightening up this afternoon
text: rather cloudy with some patchy light rain or drizzle at first across southern areas , then all parts becoming dry with some sunny spells by midday .
winds will be lighter than of late .
author: Owain Wyn Evans
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: doncaster fire death : investigation underway
text: south yorkshire police and fire service investigators are starting their work to determine how a fire started in a shed in doncaster where a 13-year-old boy 's body was found .

documents.title: delays m1 southbound in south yorkshire
text: a broken down lorry has left a lane blocked on an exit slip road to j32 ( m18 ) of the m1 southbound .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: teenage boy found dead in doncaster fire
text: a teenage boy has been found dead in a fire in doncaster .
fire investigators this morning have been at a house on byron avenue in campsall where the body of a 13-year-old boy was found in a shed fire last night .
crews were called out at 21:00 to a report of a shed on fire .
when they put the fire out they found a the boy 's body .
south yorkshire police say they 're now conducting a joint investigation with the fire service to establish the cause of the fire .
author: Kevin Larkin
Doncaster Reporter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: a630 at doncaster partly closed with queuing traffic both ways
text: a630 balby road in doncaster closed with queuing traffic in both directions between belmont avenue and westfield road because of a building fire .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: happy friday .
it 's kate here with your updates for sheffield and south yorkshire until 18:00 .
take a look at sheffield artist pete mckee 's latest mural that 's formed part of a new art trail across sheffield :
author: Kate Linderholm
